comment: PRE-REVIEW ASSESSMENT: COMPLIANT. Verified frontmatter: title="Transport-Based Identity Resolution (Phase 1)", revision_summary="Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1). All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present and complete. No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) in pre-approved sections 1-9. Execution phase placeholders in sections 10-12 are appropriate for pre-review stage. References include SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-007, SDLC-QMS-RS, and SDLC-QMS-RTM. Section numbering is sequential and correct. No typos or formatting errors found. Development controls for SDLC-governed submodule are documented per established pattern (Section 7.4). Qualified state continuity plan is documented (Section 7.5). SDK verification chain in Section 5.2 provides evidence of technical feasibility. No TU assignment warranted â€” affected files are all infrastructure/QMS-layer components outside Flow State application domains. One operational note: document contains Unicode arrow characters (U+2192) in Section 5.2 that cause the MCP qms_read tool to fail on Windows charmap codec; this is not a document compliance issue but may warrant attention during execution.

PRE-REVIEW ASSESSMENT (re-review after Unicode fix): COMPLIANT. Verified frontmatter: title="Transport-Based Identity Resolution (Phase 1)", revision_summary="Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1). All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present and complete. Section numbering sequential and correct (1-12 with appropriate subsections). No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) in pre-approved sections 1-9; execution phase placeholders in sections 10-12 appropriate for pre-review. Unicode issue from previous review RESOLVED: Section 5.2 SDK verification chain (lines 68-71) now uses ASCII "->" instead of Unicode U+2192 arrows. All em-dash positions use ASCII "--" (double hyphen). No remaining Unicode characters that could cause Windows cp1252 codec failures. References valid (SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-007, SDLC-QMS-RS v8.0, SDLC-QMS-RTM v10.0). Development controls for SDLC-governed submodule documented (Section 7.4). Qualified state continuity plan documented (Section 7.5). No typos, formatting errors, or other deficiencies found. No TU assignment warranted -- affected files are infrastructure/QMS-layer components outside Flow State application domains.

POST-REVIEW ASSESSMENT: NON-COMPLIANT. One deficiency found requiring correction.

VERIFIED ITEMS (PASS):
- Frontmatter title: "Transport-Based Identity Resolution (Phase 1)" -- present and non-empty.
- All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present (Purpose through References).
- Section numbering sequential and correct (1-12 with subsections).
- No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) found.
- All 6 EIs show Pass outcome with execution evidence documented.
- No open VARs; no Fail outcomes in EI table.
- Execution Summary (Section 11) complete and accurate.
- SDLC prerequisites met: SDLC-QMS-RS EFFECTIVE v9.0, SDLC-QMS-RTM EFFECTIVE v11.0.
- CI verification evidence: run 21878115349, 378/378 tests, commit d2ad514.
- RTM qualified baseline commit hash is "d2ad514" (actual value, not placeholder).
- References updated: RS v9.0, RTM v11.0 match current EFFECTIVE versions.
- Formatting consistent throughout.

DEFICIENCY (FAIL):
1. revision_summary = "Initial draft" -- This value is stale for a v1.2 document that has completed full execution. Per SOP-001 Section 5.1, revision_summary shall be "Updated each revision cycle to describe changes." The value "Initial draft" was appropriate at v0.1 but has not been updated through the v1.1 and v1.2 revision cycles. Update to describe the current document state (e.g., execution completion summary).

ACTION REQUIRED: Update the revision_summary frontmatter field to reflect the current v1.2 document state, then re-route for post-review.

POST-REVIEW RE-ASSESSMENT: NON-COMPLIANT. The previous deficiency (stale revision_summary) was partially addressed but a new issue was introduced.

VERIFIED (PASS - unchanged from prior review):
- Frontmatter title: "Transport-Based Identity Resolution (Phase 1)" -- present and non-empty.
- All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present.
- No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) found.
- All 6 EIs show Pass with evidence. No open VARs.
- Execution Summary complete. SDLC prerequisites met (RS v9.0, RTM v11.0 EFFECTIVE).
- CI evidence: run 21878115349, 378/378 tests, commit d2ad514.
- References current. Formatting consistent.

DEFICIENCY (FAIL):
1. revision_summary is TRUNCATED. Raw file lines 3-4 show: "Execution complete. All 6 EIs pass. 378/378 tests, CI verified. RS v9.0 and RTM v11.0 EFFECTIVE. PR" -- the value ends with "PR". The intended "#9 merged." was lost because the unquoted YAML "#" character was parsed as a comment delimiter, stripping everything after it. Fix: either quote the entire value (e.g., revision_summary: 'Execution complete...PR #9 merged.') or rephrase to avoid the # character (e.g., "PR-9 merged" or "pull request 9 merged").

ACTION REQUIRED: Fix the YAML quoting in revision_summary to preserve the full value, then re-route for post-review.

POST-REVIEW ASSESSMENT (Round 3): COMPLIANT. All verification items pass. Previous deficiency resolved.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Transport-Based Identity Resolution (Phase 1)" -- present, non-empty.
- revision_summary: "Execution complete. All 6 EIs pass. 378/378 tests, CI verified. RS v9.0 and RTM v11.0 EFFECTIVE. PR #9 merged." -- properly YAML-quoted, descriptive, complete. Previous truncation issue resolved.

STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present. Section numbering correct (1-12 with subsections).

EXECUTION TABLE: All 6 EIs show Pass with execution evidence. No Fail outcomes. No VARs required or open.

EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11): Complete and accurate. Covers file count, test counts, CI verification, SDLC status, merge outcome.

SDLC PREREQUISITES: SDLC-QMS-RS EFFECTIVE v9.0. SDLC-QMS-RTM EFFECTIVE v11.0. Both confirmed via qms_status.

CI EVIDENCE: Run 21878115349, 378/378 tests, commit d2ad514. RTM qualified baseline is actual commit hash, not placeholder.

REFERENCES: RS v9.0, RTM v11.0 match current EFFECTIVE versions. SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-007 referenced.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: None found (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX).
TYPOS/ERRORS: None found.
FORMATTING: Consistent throughout.

Recommend for post-approval.
